name: Healing Cabbage Soup
author: JGCASE
summary: My body craves this soup whenever I have a cold, but it's good anytime. Due to the garlic, however, it might be a good idea to be sure that everyone around you eats it, too!
ingredients: ½ teaspoon black pepper, or to taste
½ head cabbage, cored and coarsely chopped
1 (14.5 ounce) can Italian-style stewed tomatoes, drained and diced
directions: In a large stockpot, heat olive oil over medium heat
Stir in onion and garlic; cook until onion is transparent, about 5 minutes
Stir in water, bouillon, salt, and pepper
Bring to a boil, then stir in cabbage
Simmer until cabbage wilts, about 10 minutes
Return to a boil, then simmer 15 to 30 minutes, stirring often
